tex:driver.xh:p: The PCSL Table condenses the Proto-Cuneiform Sign List into a convenient overview of the entire Proto-Cuneiform repertoire and its various data sources. The contents of the columns are as follows:

xh:dl.xh:dd: The core PCSL data: the sign name and category tag are at the top of the case; the distribution, Oracc ID (OID) and ZATU number, if any, are at the bottom of the case. If the sign is proposed for encoding in PC25, the hex codepoint and reference glyph are given in the middle of the case.
The glyphs as given in PCSL.ttf, with their codepoints. Glyphs coloured blue are not included in the CDLI-gh collection.
The original CDLI-gh image, scaled from a 600dpi image set downloaded from the CDLI website in 2016.

Glyphs as given in the sign lists of the relevant text editions, but drawn from the PCSL font. Glyphs in red differ in naming from CDLI-gh; (o) means that the instance has no variant code; (a), (b), etc., means that the instance has the given variant code.

tex:driver.tex:appendix: PC25 Not Encoded: Uruk V not in Sub-corpus
PC25 Not Encoded: Uruk IV/III not in Sub-corpus
PC25 Not Encoded: ED I-II not in Sub-corpus
